last_episode_to_air.name: Goodbye, My Dear Warrior
last_episode_to_air.overview: Finally, all things must come to an end. Sky grows up to be a changed adult. One thing has never changed: her love and longing for Hochi.

name: My Dear Warrior
original_name: มหัศจรรย์รักข้ามกระดาษ
overview: Sky is beautiful single female astronomer at a planetarium and has received a gift: a thick wooden-covered book and magic pen from Vanda, her aunt who has been taking care of Sky since childhood and is a crazy writer who is suffering from amnesia.

episodes.name: The Beginning of the Chaotic Journey
episodes.overview: Sky's aunt has written a manga but didn't get to finish due to Alzheimer's. Then things start to unravel when Sky finds an ancient book in her home.

episodes.name: The Quest of Rescuing the Book
episodes.overview: Sky can't believe Hochi, the man who she has dreamed of, appears in front of her. Hochi who lost the love of his life still has a lot to process.

episodes.name: The Troubled Visitor
episodes.overview: Sky consults Prof. Zing about the possibility of a character would really come to life. Wanda starts to remember something about the mysterious "J."

episodes.name: The Lost Puzzle
episodes.overview: Hochi sneaks out to look for Luna. While looking for him, Sky meets a man who claims to be Wanda's ex-husband. Kairo determines to bring Luna back.

episodes.name: When the Heart Starts to Feel
episodes.overview: Sky is very worried that Wanda and Hochi are in danger. Things get worse when Hochi's hands seem to fade. Someone visits Wanda when she's home alone.

episodes.name: The Remaining of the Past
episodes.overview: After being forced to write something in the book, Wanda starts to remember that Jett is an abusive man. Hochi and Sky comes to her rescue in time.

episodes.name: The Battle of the Triangle Lovers
episodes.overview: Luna runs away from Kairo and reunites with Hochi. The lovers are finally happy. Surprisingly, Sky doesn't like what she sees. Kairo doesn't give up.

episodes.name: The Lost Book
episodes.overview: Luna wants Hochi to run away and starts a new life together but Hochi is uncertain. Sky struggles to find the book and bring all the characters home.

episodes.name: True Love
episodes.overview: Pangyu from the book starts to use his black magic to kill people. Time is running out. Hochi and all the characters may disappear forever.

episodes.name: The Devil from the Shadows
episodes.overview: Hochi and Kairo must join force to defeat Pangyu. No one knows what to expect as things are hanging by the thread. A heart is changed forever.

episodes.name: The Road Trip
episodes.overview: The fateful fight with Pangyu may cause Hochi his life. Wanda disappears with the book. With no choice, the broken-hearted Luna goes back to Kairo's.

episodes.name: Only Us
episodes.overview: Wanda has left clues about the book and her whereabouts. Hochi and Sky decide to travel to bring the book back. They get to spend a night together.

episodes.name: Found
episodes.overview: While Hochi and Sky are on the hunt to find the book, Luna and Kairo lean on each other to survive the new world. Luna hopes that Kairo is changing.

episodes.name: The Darkness
episodes.overview: Kairo chases Luna away. Realizing the book is the key to the time portal, Hochi, Sky and Wanda rush to find it. Wanda remembers a starry island.

episodes.name: The Hope in the Eye of the Storm
episodes.overview: Hochi and Sky have a brief moment of happiness, then they are forced to brave the rough sea on a stormy night. Can the boat withstand deadly waves?

episodes.name: The Last Puzzle
episodes.overview: The quest for the book continues. Things come in full circle and bring everyone to the place where it all begins: the science center.

episodes.name: The Last Wish Upon the Moon
episodes.overview: It's revealed where the book has been kept but no one knows how to open the time portal. All the characters reunite but is there enough time left?

episodes.name: The Chance Has Come
episodes.overview: Everyone wants to open the time portal before it's too late. The Big Bang theory suggests the end may as well be the beginning. Jett has an idea!

episodes.name: Time Is Up
episodes.overview: Hochi and Sky decide to make the most of the remaining time while Jett reveals the secrets and inspirations behind the manga, "My Dear Warrior."

episodes.name: Goodbye, My Dear Warrior
episodes.overview: Finally, all things must come to an end. Sky grows up to be a changed adult. One thing has never changed: her love and longing for Hochi.
